TopicTitle: Appearantly the small Mk-1 aircraft cockpit has two control stations

Articles.Content: If you go into Iva on the Mk-1 cockpit and double click as far left or right as you can see, you will switch to the airlock view. And if you look up, there is another full control station, window included! I can't provide pictures right now, but it's something most players probably never saw.

Just now, Kinglet said:

If you go into Iva on the Mk-1 cockpit and double click as far left or right as you can see, you will switch to the airlock view. And if you look up, there is another full control station, window included! I can't provide pictures right now, but it's something most players probably never saw.

Yup seen it, It's awesome for docking!
You can also double click the huge computer screen that says "DOCKING MODE"
